title: Lowest reliance on fossil fuels for electricity
description: In 2021, only 0.0004% of Nepal's electricity production came from oil, gas, and coal sources, indicating a minimal reliance on fossil fuels.

title: Minimal CO2 emissions from energy fugitive emissions
description: Nepal's CO2 emissions from fugitive emissions in the energy sector were just 0.0001 Mt CO2e in 2023, one of the lowest in the world.

title: Minimal CO2 emissions from power industry
description: In 2018, Nepal's CO2 emissions from the power industry were only 0.0001 Mt CO2e, showcasing its low carbon footprint in this sector.

title: Low percentage of service imports in communications and computers
description: In 2023, communications, computers, and related services accounted for only 0.99% of Nepal's service imports, one of the lowest globally.

title: Low new displacement due to conflict and violence
description: Nepal had only 2 new cases of displacement due to conflict and violence in 2017, indicating a stable internal situation.
